title: Court orders Dubai ruler to pay ex-wife $728m -- one of the UK's largest ever divorce settlements
content:
1. Court orders Dubai ruler to pay ex-wife $728m -- one of the UK's largest ever divorce settlements  CNN
  2. Dubai ruler must provide $733 million to settle U.K. custody case  NBC News
  3. Dubai princess wins 554 million pounds from sheikh in UK settlement  Reuters
  4. Dubai ruler’s divorce settlement reveals ‘truly opulent’ standard of living  The Guardian
  5. Princess Paid Bodyguard $9M in Blackmail to Keep Their Affair Quiet, But Still Got Busted  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ドバイの支配者が元妻に7億2800万ドルを支払うよう裁判所が命令--英国史上最大級の離婚調停額
法院命令迪拜统治者向前妻支付7.28亿美元--英国有史以来最大的离婚协议之一
法院命令迪拜統治者向前妻支付7.28億美元--英國有史以來最大的離婚協議之一
